channel.title: Rsps , How can i add new player right like : player right = 4 : Owner
channel.description:
Hello guys :)
I am coding my rsps but i have a problem .. I would like to create a new player right !
I already have : 0 = Normal player , 1= Mod , 2 = admin 3= Owner
But i want too make a special player right just for me , for adding [Server owner ] in the yell box :)
Anyone can help me ? Thank you so much :)

item.title: Rsps , How can i add new player right like : player right = 4 : Owner
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=472911.msg3458733#msg3458733 date=1294276264]
@Dastan_
Runespace is actualy a pritty good coder im sure he just posted in the wrong topic so he gave a quick explination i also understand you are a good coder

@runespace
dude! you forgot to make it

yell("[Bitch Name Owner]: "+command.substring(21); // Not 5 :P

oh and conventions … lol…
!!! jk
[/quote] The number five was getting the substring of "yell " which is five characters. (Yell is four, and the space is one, but the space is actually the fourth character, as the substring starts at five. Remember Java starts counting at zero.) So, you are wrong about that part, but you both missed a closing parenthesis after substring(int).[/quote]

i was basing it off his original code of 20 characters long +1 for space
Think we were being funny

I mean i just told people how to add real ranks and vet ranks with dailies some other forum

Read full topic

}
